name: antsama
text: Who would have thought such simple expressions could be so priceless?

name: stabones
text:
a guy is rocking my can!

ha!

name: farqussus
text: well I'll be buggered.

name: aargh
text: More chubbies, people. Come on.

name: lexsenthur
text:
Oh dear, it's at 69.

I've noticed that on a lot of comments...

name: farqussus
text: with that moustache I'm not surprised

name: greenkoolayd
text: do you think its cool to have a facial hair bias?

name: farqussus
text: whatever, my dad thirty years ago.

name: flynn
text: Ray's effort here is really endearing.

name: agika
text: Ray means well, he just overdid it on the "understanding".

name: zem
text: annoying pat a bit is not an accident on ray's part, I am sure

name: spinynorman
text: Anyone who wants to broaden their minds on homosexuality should say Ray's second to last line out loud. You'll find your life changes dramatically. I, for example, was promptly fired from my job.

name: presterjohn
text: Positively Woody-Allen-esque. Early, funny Woody, too. Since I can't give you a Woody I will give you a chubby.

name: pogo
text: A comment left by pogo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, aliiis, kenthegod, dullard)

name: mercuri0us
text: No you didn't.  Did you.

name: terribleman
text: A 59 year old wrote this. Chubs!

name: tourach3
text: i got propositioned, myself

name: aelindil
text: I am ridiculously pleased at the fact that I have given this comment its 69th chubby.

name: abe
text: What Ray does here is the only possible way to honestly handle that situation.

name: epicurus
text: Is that really what it is like? Can someone comment on the veracity of Ray's prediction?

name: agika
text: Are you sure you can handle the truth, Epicurus?

name: epicurus
text: Maybe it's best that I not know the terrible reality.

name: jackparsons
text: from wikipedia: "Epicurus never married and we don't know of any children."

name: epicurus
text:
Oh shit, you mean the historical Epicurus was...

A badminton player?

name: fallow_fields
text: chubby for implying the word 'shuttlecock'

name: epicurus
text: TOTALLY on purpose, too.

name: fallow_fields
text: then DOUBLE chubby

name: cailetshadow
text: chubby for a Masterful use of Wikipedia.

name: gormster
text: Gay first time story: having read this strip before then, it did actually run through my head, and I nearly laughed out loud, which would have been a bad thing to do, probably.

name: saru
text: I make sure all my hypothetical gay lovers know that my ass is ticklish, just in case.

name: catachresis
text: Strip ends abruptly; my face settles into a bemused and satisfied smile

name: william
text: Alt Text: Ray is trying to prove that he has an open mind.

name: terribleman
text: I could have sworn that he was just fucking with him.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray is embarassed about his gas.

name: prufrock
text: are Ray's arms flabby or beefy?

name: alphagator
text: "husky"

name: greenkoolayd
text: you may choose between fleefy, or blabby.

name: qatipay
text: 5 for Ray's guileless attempts at being supportive, and for what goes on between his sheets.

name: luckyg
text:
"So, you take it in the can now! That's different."

I too have a habit of casually making completely inappropriate statements like this.

name: jonmw
text: That's the kind of habit that I aim to cultivate.

name: soilentshuggah
text: Panel #6 is godlike.

name: rogergs
text: Even a distinguishing mark such as artisanal rum is not enough to absolve Ray of complicity in the number one cocktail cliche of the 00s.

name: saru
text:
"Mojitos are a gay drink," or mojitos in general?
I need to know whether to chubby or lame you, since if it's the second, I really don't like people telling my I shouldn't enjoy something anymore just because it's popular (of course, I always hated mojitos. But then again, my longtime favorite, the gimlet, has suddenly become popular.)

name: i_love_kate
text: I can't stand Mojitos. Far too much work for a cocktail, and the one I had was just overpoweringly minty. Give me a good Whiskey Sour any day.

name: missdove
text: Didn't Ernest Hemingway use to get all spry on Mojitos and go out and machine-gun sharks?

name: terribleman
text: Hey-o!

name: molesticide
text: i've given it some thought in the past, and yeah, that's just about where i ended up too.  kind of a slightly bemused curiosity.

name: pwb
text:
"I didn't want you to think I was homophobic at you"

totally classic Ray

name: honesttom
text: You cannot get much more Rayesque than this strip.

name: overmedicated
text: I like Pat in this strip. He's pleasant, he's polite, and I can totally sympathise with his getting a little...pissy. Don't ask, it involves my father, a hidden camera and a boy from the local swimming team.

name: professoryes
text: Against my better judgment, I'm going to take that at face value. I will not ask.

name: nigelchaos
text: After that, I don't think there's much left to ask.

name: jinxtigr
text: Wouldn't a camera kinda hurt?

name: neck_romancer
text:
i was thinking of this strip and chuckling to myself while washing dishes at work and of course, while my boss was walking by i, unknowingly, muttered "A DUDE IS ROCKIN' MY CAN"
don't have to worry about her ever speaking to me again

name: ghoti
text: In panel 8, Ray's nipple starts to droop.

name: afterward
text: I am going to chubby this and then go see if it is true.

name: missbee
text: probably my favorite strip ever :D

name: missbee
text:
yet i am neutral?
i made a mistake and i must correct it. i am correcting it right now. i am totally pro this strip.

name: zem
text: no, you just pro'd your neutral comment. you're making it worse!!

name: spinynorman
text: Man, I never remember or even fucking bother to change that. I guess don't have the heart of a true assetbar devotee.

name: dovey
text: Oh I wouldn't say that Mr Norman. Your contribution to the bar of assets goes way beyond your negligence of the pro/neu/con option.

name: fuzzyrobot
text:
Pat's expression in the final panel isn't annoyance, it's more like angry astonishment.

"Wh--GOD DAMNIT HOW DOES HE KNOW THAT"

name: audhumla
text: well that is pretty much how it goes

name: budenhagen
text: I am SO glad one of the friends that I've known since milk money days came out of the closet. The greatest Christmas gift he could've ever given me was the gift of an Achewood quote setup.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Philippe: Car crash sin.
Molly: The Achewood A-List! August 16, 2006
Nice Pete: Camping

name: achilleselbow
text: Ray's dialogue here reminds of someone from the older generation trying way too hard to demonstrate open-mindedness.

name: numberkillinger
text: You have a penchant for rephrasing the alt-text

name: pogo
text: Ray apparently never really imagined taking it in the can before, and feels he would be enthusuastic.

name: nyu
text: The face I'd make if a dude was rocking my can would be none so ponderous.

name: yomimono
text: After I came out I had a conversation kind of like this, only it was with my dad instead of my extremely wealthy, constantly buzzed friend.

name: boredom_man
text: Yomimono's father attempts to support his daughter's orientation, but is stymied by his belief that a "lesbian" is someone who likes dudes to rock her can.

name: macseries
text: i think pat's annoyance stems from the fact that he is, in fact, the one who does can-rockin'.

name: tekende
text:
I think it stems from the fact that he probably hasn't been out of the closet long enough to actually experience any can-rocking, whether receiving or giving.

Also he is kind of a prude.

name: greenkoolayd
text: she...

name: greenkoolayd
text: i dont know why i replied in such a way, or at all, even....... fuck THIS guy!

name: bluemoon72
text: Are you asking, or demanding?

name: greenkoolayd
text: i was raised to be polite.

name: bluemoon72
text: Throw a "please" on there and you got yourself a deal, politeboy.

name: greenkoolayd
text: get out here! french me! please.

name: terribleman
text: Romance. I wanted to chubby every post, but I ran out.

name: zapatos
text: Ray has a most impressive foyer, they are walking forever!

name: desert_donkey
text: i love how ray never 'gets it'.. but he's always got it.

name: tangles
text: man, is strips like this where i wonder why the hell pat and ray keep talking to each other. they have absolutley nothing in common and are perfect representations of one another's anathema. then again, maybe this is why we haven't seen pat for a while...

name: dusty
text: If you were taking it in the can and you loved it, that would be good but it would take some life adjustments, if you didn't like it that would be bad, but you could quit and try to forget the whole thing. What would be difficult is if you just kinda disliked it, the way a woman who's been married for a decade is about giving oral. You would have to be gay and bored.
